chatInput.reasoningNotSupported: Your current chat model does not support reasoning. Please select a reasoning-capable model (GPT-5, o3, DeepSeek-R1) in AI Config â†’ Models.

tools.title: Available Tools
tools.description: Explore and use powerful tools to enhance your workflow

help.title: Help
help.noContent: No help available for this page

summary.title: Summary Configuration
summary.description: This builds a prompt for the configured AI model to summarize the submitted text.
summary.focusAreasHelp: Select what to focus on in the summary
summary.processingNote: Processing large documents may take several minutes. Please be patient.
summary.dragDropTitle: Drop your file here or click to browse
summary.dragDropDesc: Upload a document to extract and summarize its content

mail.title: Mail Handler Configuration
mail.portHelp: Server port (993 for IMAP SSL, 995 for POP3 SSL)
mail.usernameHelp: Email address or username for authentication
mail.checkIntervalHelp: How often to check for new emails
mail.departmentsDescription: Configure up to 10 target email addresses for forwarding processed emails
mail.departmentNote: You must set at least one department as DEFAULT. Processed emails will be forwarded to the appropriate department based on content analysis.
mail.processingNote: Mail handler will automatically process incoming emails and forward them to appropriate departments.
mail.testConnectionDescription: Review your configuration and test the connection to ensure everything is working correctly.
mail.handlerNameHelp: Give this mail handler a descriptive name
mail.savedHandlersDesc: Manage your automated email processing configurations
mail.noHandlersDesc: Create your first mail handler to start automating email processing

files.groupKeywordHelp: Enter a keyword to group related files together for RAG search
files.supportedFormats: Select one or more files (PDF, DOCX, TXT, JPG, PNG, MP3, MP4)
files.processingInfo: Files are automatically extracted and vectorized for optimal RAG performance.
files.filterHelp: Choose a file group to filter the results. Upload new files above to create new groups.
files.name: NAME
files.attachedToMessage: This file is attached to a message
files.standaloneFile: This file is standalone (not attached to any message)

inbound.title: Inbound
inbound.description: You can reach this platform via different channels. Different channels offer different features, if you set those up. Please take a look at the channels listed below:
inbound.addKeyword: Check for a free keyword to add your own handling:
inbound.apiDescription: Simple API calls with your personal API key:
inbound.widgetDescription: To activate the widget, please enter your domain name like "yourdomain.net" in the field below.

aiModels.title: AI Models
aiModels.description: Configure and manage your AI models
aiModels.systemModelNote: System models are automatically locked and cannot be changed. These are core models required for specific functionality.
aiModels.noModels: No models available for this purpose
aiModels.name: NAME

taskPrompts.title: Prompt Management
taskPrompts.subtitle: Manage and customize AI prompts for different tasks
taskPrompts.selectPromptHelp: Choose an existing prompt to edit or use as template
taskPrompts.rulesHelp: When should this prompt be used? Define the rules for automatic selection
taskPrompts.aiModelHelp: Select which AI model to use for this prompt. Models are grouped by their capabilities.
taskPrompts.availableToolsHelp: Enable tools that will be available when using this prompt
taskPrompts.promptContentPlaceholder: Enter the system prompt that will guide the AI's behavior for this task...
taskPrompts.contentHelp: This is the system message that guides the AI's behavior
taskPrompts.name: Name
taskPrompts.deleteWarning: Deleting this prompt is permanent and cannot be undone.

sortingPrompt.title: Preprocessor
sortingPrompt.description: The preprocessor handles the incoming message. It gets the message as a JSON object and returns a JSON object.
sortingPrompt.promptEditorLink: to change existing prompts OR add new prompts
sortingPrompt.mainTitle: Set BTOPIC and Tools in JSON
sortingPrompt.mainDescription: Define the intention of the user with every request. You will have the history, but put your focus on the new message.
sortingPrompt.jsonDescription: The JSON object is the form we save your request into the database.
sortingPrompt.jsonNote: The whole object is passed to the preprocessor. The preprocessor can change the object and return it to the central process. The central process will save the changed object into the database.
sortingPrompt.jsonExample: Here is an example of the JSON object:
sortingPrompt.btopicNote: The preprocessor can also return a new JSON object. That is setting the topic and by that, directing the message to a specific prompt. The BTOPIC is the name of YOUR TARGET prompt!

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Create and manage API keys for accessing the API.
apiKeys.confirmRevoke: Are you sure you want to revoke this API key? It will no longer be able to access the API.
apiKeys.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this API key? This action cannot be undone.

modal.subtitle: Your new API key has been created. Copy it now and store it securely.
modal.warningText: For security reasons, this key will only be shown once. Make sure to copy and store it in a secure location before closing this window.
modal.autoClose: This window will close automatically in {seconds} seconds

apiKeys.noKeys: No API keys yet. Create your first key to get started.

phoneVerification.title: Phone Verification
phoneVerification.description: Verify your phone number to unlock full features and higher rate limits via WhatsApp.
phoneVerification.codeSentSuccess: Verification code sent to your WhatsApp
phoneVerification.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove your phone number? You will lose access to full features.

usage.title: Usage Statistics
usage.description: Track your API usage across all channels and features

lifetime.title: Free Limit Reached
lifetime.description: You've used all {limit} {action} in your free plan. Upgrade to continue!

hourly.title: Hourly Limit Reached
hourly.description: You've reached your hourly limit of {limit} {action}. Your limit will reset soon.

monthly.title: Monthly Limit Reached
monthly.description: You've used all {limit} {action} this month. Upgrade for more!

auth.forgotPasswordDesc: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.termsAgree: By signing up, you agree to our
auth.emailSentDesc: We've sent a password reset link to {email}. Please check your inbox.
auth.verifyEmailDesc: We've sent a verification link to {email}. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your email address.
auth.checkSpam: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or try resending.
auth.emailVerifiedDesc: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now access all features of your account.
auth.accountReady: Your account is ready to use

unsavedChanges.title: You have unsaved changes
unsavedChanges.description: Your changes will be lost if you leave without saving. Press ESC to discard.
unsavedChanges.confirmLeave: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?

widget.title: Chat Support
widget.subtitle: We typically reply in minutes
widget.limitReachedDetails: You have reached the maximum number of messages for this session. Please contact us directly for further assistance.
widget.fileUploadLimitReached: File upload limit reached for this session.
widget.fileUploadFailed: File upload failed. Please try again.
widget.sendFailed: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
widget.defaultAssistantReply: Thanks for your message! I'll get right back to you.

hints.iconColor: Color for the icon inside the button
hints.autoMessage: Automated first message shown to visitors
hints.aiPrompt: Select the AI prompt to use for this widget
hints.autoOpen: Open automatically after a few seconds
hints.integrationType: Choose how the widget is embedded on your site

placeholders.autoMessage: Hello! How can I help you today?

widget.embedCodeHint: Copy this code to your website's <head> section

widgets.title: Chat Widgets
widgets.subtitle: Embed AI-powered chat widgets on your website
widgets.emptyDescription: Create your first chat widget to embed it on your website
widgets.taskPromptHelp: Only custom task prompts can be used for widgets. System prompts are not available.
widgets.noCustomPrompts: No custom task prompts available. Please create a custom task prompt first.
widgets.autoOpenHelp: Open the chat widget automatically after page load
widgets.autoMessagePlaceholder: Hello! How can I help you today?
widgets.allowFileUploadHelp: Let visitors attach files. Extracted text is automatically added to the widget's knowledge base.
widgets.fileUploadLimitHelp: Maximum number of files each visitor can upload per session. Set to 0 for unlimited uploads.
widgets.htmlCodeDescription: Paste this code before the closing </body> tag of your website
widgets.wordPressDescription: Use this shortcode in any WordPress page or post
widgets.websitePreviewHelp: Optional: Enter a public URL to see how the widget looks on your site. Pages that block iframes will show a placeholder instead.
widgets.websitePreviewEmpty: Add a website URL above to see your widget on top of your site.
widgets.installationStep2: Paste it before the closing </body> tag on your website
widgets.installationStep3: The widget will appear automatically on all pages
widgets.allowedDomainsHelp: Only the domains listed below can load and use this widget. Use wildcards like *.example.com to cover subdomains.
widgets.invalidDomain: Please enter a valid domain (e.g., example.com or *.example.com).
widgets.allowedDomainsLimit: You can whitelist up to {max} domains.
widgets.localhostTooltip: Localhost domains are for local testing only. Remove them before deploying publicly.
widgets.localhostWarningDescription: Keeping localhost or 127.0.0.1 in the allow list enables testing but should be removed before sharing the widget publicly to avoid security risks.
widgets.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Let's get you back on track.
notFound.hint: If you believe this is an error, please contact support.

error.title: Something Went Wrong
error.description: We encountered an unexpected error. Don't worry, our team has been notified and is working on it.
error.contactSupport: If this problem persists, please contact our support team with the error details below.

processing.classifyingDesc: AI is analyzing the intent and content
processing.generatingDesc: AI is crafting your answer with

error.restartNote: After downloading, refresh the page and try again.

chatShare.title: Share Chat
chatShare.makePublicDescription: Make it public to share with others and get indexed by search engines.
chatShare.benefit1: Anyone with the link can view the conversation
chatShare.benefit2: Searchable by Google and other search engines
chatShare.benefit3: Perfect for sharing knowledge and examples
chatShare.seoDescription: This chat is now indexed by search engines like Google. Share the link on social media or embed it on your website!
